ADVANCING UNCERTAINTY ANALYSIS PROCESSES IN RISK-INFORMED REGULATORY FRAMEWORK TO SUPPORT SIMULATION APPROACHES FOR AGING PLANTS AND ADVANCED REACTORS AT THE UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS

OECD/NRC LIQUID METAL FAST REACTOR (LMFR) CORE THERMAL-HYDRAULIC BENCHMARK FOR VERIFICATION, VALIDATION, AND UNCERTAINTY QUANTIFICATION (VVUQ) OF SUB-CHANNEL AND COMPUTATIONAL FLUID DYNAMICS (CFD) CODES
UNDERSTANDING MICROSTRUCTURE-MECHANICAL BEHAVIOR RELATIONSHIPS IN COATED CLADDING ACCIDENT TOLERANT FUEL (ATF) CONCEPTS FOR USED FUEL STORAGE AND TRANSPORTATION
APPLICATION OF ADVANCED AND HYBRID RISK TOOLS IN EXTERNAL HAZARD PRA: CHALLENGES AND OPPORTUNITIES
ADDRESSING TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE GAPS FOR CONCRETE CREEP, CREEP RECOVERY, AND CREEP FRACTURE
DYNAMIC RISK ASSESSMENT FOR NUCLEAR CYBERSECURITY
A SELF-POWERED PLATFORM TO MEASURE AND REPORT SPENT NUCLEAR FUEL PACKAGE TEMPERATURES DURING TRANSPORT WITHOUT CONTAINMENT BOUNDARY PENETRATIONS
ASSESSMENT OF TRACE THERMAL-HYDRAULIC SYSTEM CODE FOR THE PREDICTION OF THE REACTOR CAVITY COOLING SYSTEM BEHAVIOR AND PERFORMANCE
VA. POLYTECH NON-DIMENSIONAL ANALYSIS OF DENSITY-WAVE INSTABILITIES AND DRYOUT-REWET CYCLES DURING AN ATWS
HIGH FIDELITY MODELING AND EXPERIMENTS TO INFORM SAFETY ANALYSIS CODES FOR HEAT PIPE MICROREACTORS
DEVELOPMENT OF A MODULAR PARADIGM TO ENHANCE MONTE CARLO NEUTRONICS FOR NRC COMPREHENSIVE REACTOR ANALYSIS BUNDLE (CRAB)
HEAT TRANSFER EXPERIMENTAL AND COMPUTATIONAL DATA FOR MOLTEN SALT REACTORS APPLICATIONS
EXPERIMENTAL INVESTIGATION OF HEAT TRANSFER AND PRESSURE DROP CHARACTERISTICS OF AHTR CHANNELS
RISK-INFORMED CONDITION ASSESSMENT OF SPENT NUCLEAR FUEL CANISTERS USING EXPERIMENTAL MEASUREMENTS AND HIGH-FIDELITY COMPUTATIONAL MODELS
IMPROVING FOUNDATIONAL KNOWLEDGE OF DEPENDENCY IN HUMAN RELIABILITY ANALYSIS
